mapper.select: SELECT ca.id, c2.id as city_parent_id, c.name as city_name, c2.name as city_parent_name, city_id cityId, concat(IFNULL(c2.name, ''), IFNULL(c.name, '')) as city, address, zip_code zipCode, receiver, moblephone, telphone, is_default isDefault, customer_id customerId FROM customer_addresses ca LEFT JOIN cities c on ca.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN cities c2 on c.parent_id = c2.id WHERE ca.customer_id = #{id} and ca.status = 1 ORDER BY ca.created_at DESC

SELECT COUNT(ca.id) AS total FROM customer_addresses ca LEFT JOIN cities c on ca.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN cities c2 on c.parent_id = c2.id WHERE ca.customer_id = #{id} and ca.status = 1 ORDER BY ca.created_at DESC
